body:
Recently started learning new grease pencil features in blender and thought it'd be nice to try my hand at making some basic Ruqqie-themed reactions gifs. Unfortunately, a lot of detail is kinda lost once down-scaled (especially on FF), but hopefully the gist of each of them is still recognizable:

![](https://i.ibb.co/sbkkygZ/clapping.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/DYn0Gb8/laughing.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/wy0H7gG/lifting.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/r48rMF3/scowling.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TqMz92L/smug.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/J2XYxnC/surprised.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/H43XwjT/weak.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/PY4Nf8s/what.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/VvKsWs4/giving-crown.gif)

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:

![](https://i.ibb.co/b7qrg0L/Peek-2020-12-27-11-27-gifs3.gif)

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:

post.body:
Recently started learning new grease pencil features in blender and thought it'd be nice to try my hand at making some basic Ruqqie-themed reactions gifs. Unfortunately, a lot of detail is kinda lost once down-scaled (especially on FF), but hopefully the gist of each of them is still recognizable:

![](https://i.ibb.co/sbkkygZ/clapping.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/DYn0Gb8/laughing.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/wy0H7gG/lifting.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/r48rMF3/scowling.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TqMz92L/smug.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/J2XYxnC/surprised.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/H43XwjT/weak.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/PY4Nf8s/what.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/VvKsWs4/giving-crown.gif)

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:

![](https://i.ibb.co/b7qrg0L/Peek-2020-12-27-11-27-gifs3.gif)
post.body_html:
Recently started learning new grease pencil features in blender and thought it'd be nice to try my hand at making some basic Ruqqie-themed reactions gifs. Unfortunately, a lot of detail is kinda lost once down-scaled (especially on FF), but hopefully the gist of each of them is still recognizable:

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:

post.body:
Recently started learning new grease pencil features in blender and thought it'd be nice to try my hand at making some basic Ruqqie-themed reactions gifs. Unfortunately, a lot of detail is kinda lost once down-scaled (especially on FF), but hopefully the gist of each of them is still recognizable:

![](https://i.ibb.co/sbkkygZ/clapping.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/DYn0Gb8/laughing.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/wy0H7gG/lifting.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/r48rMF3/scowling.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/TqMz92L/smug.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/J2XYxnC/surprised.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/H43XwjT/weak.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/PY4Nf8s/what.gif)
![](https://i.ibb.co/VvKsWs4/giving-crown.gif)

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:

![](https://i.ibb.co/b7qrg0L/Peek-2020-12-27-11-27-gifs3.gif)
post.body_html:
Recently started learning new grease pencil features in blender and thought it'd be nice to try my hand at making some basic Ruqqie-themed reactions gifs. Unfortunately, a lot of detail is kinda lost once down-scaled (especially on FF), but hopefully the gist of each of them is still recognizable:

EDIT: +RuqES (long-standing userscript) now supports a quick insert menu for Ruqqie reaction gifs:
post.title: Ruqqie reaction gifs
